DOC.brief_title: Effect Docosa-Hexanoic Acid ( DHA ) Supplements During Pregnancy Newborn Outcomes India .
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blinded , randomize , placebo control trial would conduct among pregnant woman India test effectiveness supplement pregnant Indian woman 400 mg/d algal DHA compare placebo mid-pregnancy delivery . Eligible participant would randomize receive either 400 mg DHA placebo baseline measure would take enrollment participant study . This study would assess effect maternal DHA supplementation : 1 . New born anthropometry ( birth weight , length head circumference ) 2 . New born APGAR score
